credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Tacones Lejanos [High Heels]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On red background, a photograph of a polished black high-heeled shoe, the heel in the shape of a handgun, and framed by the inscription "TACONES" at top, and 'LEJANOS" at bottom. At the very top is written: "EL DESEO S.A. PRESENTA UN FILM DE PEDRO ALMODOVAR", and at bottom are the credits: "VICTORIA ABRIL  MARISA PAREDES  MIGUEL BOSE" followed by further credits in smaller type.
name: Poster
